ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: I know a guy who plays females bc he gets turned on watching his character run and fight in third person view. Very weird person. luv, -Su ... playing ... an
ygData.messageBody:
I know a guy who plays females bc he gets turned on watching his character
run and fight in third person view. Very weird person.
luv,
-Su


> Hi,
>
> ROFLOL at Rob. Yeah EC definitely!!!!
>
> I'm female and I play female characters. The only way I'd consider
playing
> a male character is if their stats were better. But, since EQ is an equal
> opportunity creator, meaning men and women share the same stats, it's not
an
> issue.
>
> Now, I do notice that when I'm playing with my 22 year old son and his
male
> character I get a few more buffs than him but not often.
>
> Maybe men play female characters because they think it will help them
> understand women better. LOL just joking!
>
> Anyway, I love the game and I don't care whether your male or female just
as
> long as you enjoy the game!
>
> Kanalyn 17 Druid
> Analyn 9 Beastlord
> Allilee 9 Ranger
> Maralexis 9 Wizard
> Tarew Marr
>
> Anelalyn 7 Cleric
> Karana
